body: You gain the services of an imp, mephit, quasit, or similar extraplanar creature from the Improved Familiar list on page 127 of the Core Rulebook. You can choose a creature with an alignment up to 1 step away from yours on each alignment axis. The creature acts as your willing servant for a number of encounters equal to your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma bonus (whichever is highest), but remains for no more than 24 hours. The creature is a called outsider and automatically returns to its home plane at the end of this service.
